item.title: PTON
item.description: score:763 Chances: Renewed interest in meme stocks and retail trading may drive more attention to Peloton’s stock. Share price of Peloton saw a recent 23% increase, indicating short-term positive momentum. Social media and Reddit’s influence on meme stocks might create short-term opportunities for Peloton investors.
